attributes.action: increase mileage rates for community NHS staff from 23pence to 44pence as recommended by the AA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, NHS community staff are reimbursed at a rate of 23pence after the first 3000 miles (which doesn't take long to achieve). Therefore, based on the AA's recommendation of a rate of 44pence a mile to cover costs, NHS staff are subsidising the NHS for every other mile traveled looking after patients. We can no longer afford this.
